data.lyric:
[ti:Screaming 呐喊]
[ar:迪玛希Dimash]
[al:Screaming 呐喊]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Screaming 呐喊 - 迪玛希Dimash (Димаш Құдайберген)
[00:01.74]词：A.J Runyon
[00:03.49]曲：Mughal
[00:05.24]编曲：孔潇一
[00:06.99]制作人：孔潇一
[00:08.74]混音：李南博
[00:10.48]录音：Yerlan（哈萨克斯坦）
[00:12.23]吉他：孔潇一
[00:13.98]和声：迪玛希Dimash
[00:15.73]出品人：聂心远
[00:17.48]出品：黑金音乐
[00:19.23]I feel you trying to turn my heart into stone
[00:24.58]
[00:25.30]Stone
[00:28.77]Put up resistance to me so I let you go
[00:35.88]
[00:36.71]But the love inside just won't subside
[00:41.76]I can't stay far from you
[00:45.38]
[00:46.21]Rips me from the seams
[00:48.75]And yet I'm fighting to believe you remember me
[00:54.73]I'm screaming ah
[01:00.81]
[01:01.34]Why can't you hear me
[01:04.01]I'm screaming ah
[01:09.68]
[01:10.43]Why can't you feel me
[01:13.28]I'm screaming inside
[01:21.38]
[01:21.95]I'm screaming inside
[01:30.03]
[01:33.50]I made mistakes and hurt you in a lot of ways
[01:39.36]
[01:42.27]And non-forgiveness forces you to punish me
[01:47.82]
[01:50.52]Such a gruesome scene is your blade of speech slices every part of me
[01:58.59]
[01:59.96]But the only thing that can't slip from me is love
[02:05.46]For the world to see
[02:08.56]I'm screaming ah
[02:14.36]
[02:15.16]Why can't you hear me
[02:17.87]I'm screaming ah
[02:23.77]
[02:24.42]Why can't you feel me
[02:27.14]I'm screaming inside
[02:28.81]Don't let us say go away everything
[02:33.17]Now I know there's a way to fix us baby
[02:37.33]
[02:37.84]I know it's difficult but can we try once more
[02:42.40]I'll get it right this time
[02:48.15]I'm screaming ah
[02:53.91]
[02:54.48]Why can't you hear me
[02:57.07]I'm screaming ah
[03:02.90]
[03:03.56]Why can't you feel me
[03:06.47]I'm screaming inside
[03:14.17]
[03:15.03]I'm screaming inside
[03:23.31]
[03:24.40]I'm screaming inside
